Bank.name: SpooferX
Bank.changelog:
- Added Support for Latest version
- Fixed Scarlet install error
Bank.description: SpooferX for Pokémon GO is an enhanced edition of the Pokémon GO app, adding a joystick and with free teleport ! It also include a lot of others features : IV checking, enhanced throw, auto walking and GPX, fast catch trick, a live feed and even a map with everything around you !
